title: november 15: don’t cut corners (with G Flip)
description:
Today on the pod, Maia charts the humble beginnings of one of our favorite fast food indulgences: the start of the Wendy’s hamburger, and it’s founder Dave Thomas. Then she has a special guest appearance by a musician who tells an important story. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
